solution_line_template: He walks {morning_walk} miles in the morning and {evening_walk} miles in the evening so that's {morning_walk}+{evening_walk} = <<{morning_walk}+{evening_walk}={daily_total}>>{daily_total} miles
If he walks {daily_total} miles everyday, for {num_days} days then he walks {daily_total}*{num_days} = <<{daily_total}*{num_days}={total_miles}>>{total_miles} miles in {num_days} days
